    • Constructor Detail

      • NeuralNetwork

        public NeuralNetwork(int inputs,
                     int outputs,
                     int hidden,
                     int layers)
        NeuralNetwork class can be instanciated with given parameters. The parameters adjust the NN accordingly.
        Please Note the parameter explanation:
        • int inputs: number of input neurons in the input layer
        • int outputs: number of output neurons in the output layer
        • int hidden: number of hidden neurons in one hidden layer (repeated for all layers)
        • int layers: number of all layers in total (input + hidden + output).
        If a NN with 3 hidden layers shall be constructed, the param int layers has to equal 5.

    • Method Detail

      • feedForward

        public float feedForward(float[] input)
        Feeds input through the network and calculates most likely output (max)
        Parameters:
        input - Array of floats
        Returns:
        output - Maximum output of the NN

      • train

        public float train(float[] inputs,
                   float expected)
        Trains the network thorugh backpropagation through all layers. The class introduces a LEARNING_CONSTANT with which aggressivness can be adjusted
        Parameters:
        inputs - Array of floats representing input data set
        expected - Expected output for given input set
        Returns:

      • max

        private static float max(OutputNeuron[] output)
        Returns the maximum possible value of all values across output layer neurons.
        Parameters:
        output - Array of OutputNeurons for evaluation
        Returns:
        maximum - Maximum value of all Neurons of type Float
